amendment.description: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the maximum capital gains tax rate, to provide a partial exclusion for interest received by individuals, to provide inflation adjustments for certain tax benefits, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5421 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 51. Record Vote Number: 301.

action.text: Amendment SA 5421 proposed by Senator Grassley to Amendment SA 5194. (consideration: CR S4183; text: CR S4339-4341) To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the maximum capital gains tax rate, to provide a partial exclusion for interest received by individuals, to provide inflation adjustments for certain tax benefits, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5421 proposed by Senator Grassley to Amendment SA 5194.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 5421 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 51. Record Vote Number: 301.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 5421 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 51. Record Vote Number: 301.
